name: Against the Grain
description:
Against the Grain A game made by LTP for the Boss Rush Jam 2023

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Story

After big corporations kidnap you to stop you from baking delicious bread, join the makeshift colosseum in the cinnamon mines and fight against strong bread warriors to show your strength! Jump and dash through powerful attacks to survive.

Will you take on the challenge?

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Choose your difficulty

The game counts with 2 difficulties, easy and hard

Easy will put you against our two bosses

The hard mode will put you against our two bosses and two extra brutal rounds!

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Controls

- Movement: WASD or Arrow keys

- Attack: Left-click or X

- Jump: Space or Z

- Dash: Right-click or C
